original_text: But the message of God's kingdom is this: ‘Love other people as much as you love yourself.’ That is what the Bible says. If you really do that, you do well.
korean_text: 너희가 만일 성경에 기록된 대로 네 이웃 사랑하기를 네 몸과 같이 하라 하신 최고의 법을 지키면 잘하는 것이거니와

sentences.original_text: But the message of God's kingdom is this:
'Love other people as much as you love yourself.'
That is what the Bible says.
